citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
**Expired medications were found in the pharmacy during the inspection. The following expired medications were
noted:
-PropoFlo inj, 200 mg/20 ml, Lot #101C8113, expiration 02/2017
-Neomycin, Polymxycin B sulfate, Bacitracin, Zn with Hydrocortisone opthalmic ointment, Lot #4M09A, expiration
11/2016
-Neomycin, Polymxycin B sulfate, Bacitracin, Zn opthalmic ointment, Lot #4J02A, expiration 08/216
**Expired medications/vaccinations should not be used in the treatment of the regulated animals. Expired
medications should be either clearly labeled as expired or disposed of in a proper manner. It is the responsibility of
the IACUC to ensure that the methods utilized in the prevention and treatment of diseases and/or injuries are in
accordance with established standard veterinary practices and the regulatory requirements of the Animal Welfare
Act.
Corrected during inspection.
Inspection and exit briefing conducted with the facility representative

narrative:
